example.parse: (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC مديرة) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الثانوية))) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (DET+ADJ.VN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC المحالة) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN التقاعد))))))) (NP (NOUN_PROP نجوى) (DET+NOUN_PROP الداعوق))))

role.argrole: to whom / what? (marked by إلى / ل /على)
